mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER_PRODUCT_REPLY (P_NO, U_NO, PR_NO, PR_CONTENT) VALUES (#{p_no}, #{u_no}, TB_USER_PRODUCT_REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{pr_content})
mapper.select:
SELECT u.U_NO, u.U_NICK, p.P_NO, r.PR_NO, r.PR_CONTENT, r.PR_CREATED_AT FROM TB_USER_PRODUCT_REPLY r INNER JOIN TB_USER u ON r.U_NO = u.U_NO INNER JOIN TB_USER_PRODUCT p ON r.P_NO = p.P_NO
WHERE p.P_NO = #{p_no}
